column1: The state also has several public arts focused high schools including Tacoma School of the Arts
column2: the Vancouver School of Arts and Academics
column3: and The Center School. There are also four Science and Math based high schools: one in the Tri-Cities known as Delta
column4: one in Tacoma known as SAMI
column5: another in Seattle known as Raisbeck Aviation High School
column6: and one in Redmond known as Tesla STEM High School.
